title: Hextech Revolver Tooltip Bug - Nidalee [Cougar]
body:
Dear Riot Team,

if you buy a "Hextech Revolver" as Cougar the tooltip of Hextech Revolver will tell you, that you deal 0 Bonus Damage with a basic attack. If you change to the Human Form it will tell you, that you deal "X" Bonus Damage with a basic attack. 

Yeah, it´s just a little bug, but the more bugs fixed the better the game is.

Sincerly

Nexocore - {{champion:268}}
